content: {"name": "Chrill Care Inc. Mobile Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serves Essex County, Client's need to Pay 12.50 $ for lunch or 18$ for three meals a day. Our weekday hot meal delivery is provided to clients who are mostly homebound due to illness, physical limitation, advanced age, or inadequate cooking facilities", "email": "", "url": "https://ccihomecare.com/mobile-meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "201 Bloomfield Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Verona", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07044", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8259046, "longitude": -74.23512769999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 744-0473", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "For homebound seniors"}]}
